gameDetails.name: Diamonds: The Thief
gameDetails.description:
Diamonds: The Thief, a mini-expansion for Diamonds, consists of a 60mm circular token ("The Thief") that moves around the table whenever the clubs suit action is taken. Note that this action is different when playing with Diamonds: The Thief rules.

NOTE: This new clubs suit action is mandatory for all official Diamonds Tournaments starting after the Gen Con 2016 tournament.
